title: It won't let me escape my game during the loading screen/game immediately
body: I am a mac user, and usually, Control Escape usually gets me out of the game without having to use the "exit the game" button just in case my ping gets out of wack and makes me leaving the game extremely laggy and log. Now this feature does not work, I was wondering if this fix is currently under your attention or if it will be fixed in the future.

replies.body:
I haven't seen anything regarding this. If you can reproduce it 100% of the time, it might be best to repost this to our [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) so we can keep an eye on this problem.

If you have any questions, let me know!
